Package economy

A package for classes directly related to the economy simulator.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent
    A person or a vendor who is offering an exchange of goods or money in a market.
    Inventory
    A data structure that represents a collection of items with varying quantities.
    Item
    An immutable item which has a name.
    Market
    A free market economy in which agents can exchange money and physical goods.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InsufficientAmountException
    Thrown to indicate that an agent has tried to do something that requires a specific amount, but does not meet such requirements.

Package economy Description

A package for classes directly related to the economy simulator.
